keyword: how many calories in a new york strip steak
title: How Many Calories in a New York Strip Steak?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a New York strip steak (8 oz serving), including protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g, and preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in a New York Strip Steak?
assumptions: 8 oz (227 g) cooked New York strip steak, broiled, USDA choice grade, fat trimmed, no added seasonings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, trimming, and portion size. Check labels or use a food scale for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz cooked New York strip steak provides ~615 kcal and ~56 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an 8 oz New York strip steak?
faqs.a: About 615 kcal for an 8 oz cooked, trimmed steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a New York strip steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 56 g protein per 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in New York strip steak?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”grilling or broiling keeps it lower; frying adds fat and calories.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a New York strip steak?
faqs.a: About 44 g total fat per 8 oz, with 19 g saturated.

faqs.q: Are New York strip steaks high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: Yes, ~193 mg per 8 oz serving, mostly from the beef.
